name: part_007
file: tmp_【Day 1】hololive English 3rd Concert -All for One-【Free Preview】 [HzTiec89h90]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Intro graphics for hololive English 3rd Concert 'All for One'.
Wide shot of the audience with light sticks, logo on screen.
Rainbow crests of hololive English members appear.
MC section: The cast of hololive English welcomes the audience.
Performance of the song 'All for One' by hololive English.
Audience cheers as the song ends, transition back to logos.
Introduction video for hololive English -Advent- members: Nerissa Ravencroft, Shiori Novella, Koseki Bijou, Fuwawa Abyssgard, and Mococo Abyssgard.

subtitles.original:
Welcome to hololive English 3rd Concert,
All for One!
subtitles.english:
Welcome to hololive English 3rd Concert,
All for One!

subtitles.original: Let's start with a bang!
subtitles.english: Let's start with a bang!

subtitles.original: All for One!
subtitles.english: All for One!

subtitles.original:

it's so incredible
